body:
In http://play.golang.org/p/FqVdPx_leT, you can't tell whether
the deferred function in c() runs before or after the c() function
returns because at long as the deferred function runs before
the call to fmt.Println at line 16 , the external behavior is the
same.

Also note that "before the return" does not mean "before the
execution of the return statement", which is false. The return
here means the transferring of execution to the called function.
